section.p: This method disables the video module.
This method disables the video module.
This method disables the video module.
This method disables the video module.

ul.li: This method sets the internal engine to a disabled state, which remains effective after leaving the channel.

Calling this method resets the entire engine and has a relatively slow response time. Depending on your needs, you can use the following methods to control specific video module features independently:
: Whether to start the camera capture and create a local video stream.
: Whether to publish the local video stream.
: Whether to receive and play the remote video stream.
: Whether to receive and play all remote video streams.
This method sets the internal engine to a disabled state and remains effective after leaving the channel.

Calling this method resets the entire engine and may take longer to respond. You can use the following methods to control specific video module features as needed:
: Whether to enable camera capture and create a local video stream.
: Whether to publish the local video stream.
: Whether to receive and play the remote video stream.
: Whether to receive and play all remote video streams.
This method sets the internal engine to a disabled state and remains effective after leaving the channel.

Calling this method resets the entire engine and may take longer to respond. You can use the following methods to control specific video functions as needed:
: Whether to enable camera capture and create the local video stream.
: Whether to publish the local video stream.
: Whether to receive and play the remote video stream.
: Whether to receive and play all remote video streams.
This method sets the internal engine to a disabled state and remains effective after leaving the channel.

Calling this method resets the entire engine, which may result in a slower response. You can use the following methods to independently control specific video module features as needed:
: Whether to start camera capture and create a local video stream.
: Whether to publish the local video stream.
: Whether to receive and play the remote video stream.
: Whether to receive and play all remote video streams.

section.title: Timing
section.p:
Can be called before or after joining a channel:
If called before joining a channel, audio-only mode is enabled.
If called after joining a channel, the mode switches from video to audio-only. You can call the method to switch back to video mode.

Can be called before or after joining a channel:
If called before joining, it enables audio-only mode.
If called after joining, it switches from video mode to audio-only mode. You can call to switch back to video mode.

Can be called before or after joining a channel:
If called before joining, audio-only mode is enabled.
If called after joining, switches from video mode to audio-only mode. You can call to switch back to video mode.

Can be called before or after joining a channel:
If called before joining a channel, audio-only mode is enabled.
If called after joining a channel, it switches from video mode to audio-only mode. You can then call the method to enable video mode.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the remote user receives the () callback.
After successfully calling this method, the remote side receives the () callback.
After this method is successfully called, the remote side receives the () callback.
After this method is called successfully, the remote side triggers the () callback.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting tips.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
